message.body: Hay! Richard and I are in fairfax and I think we're gonna stay til Friday on account of the weather. If you're free at all tomorrow maybe we can hang??
Blah! I'm working tomorrow and have evening plans! Are you leaving Friday??
Sorry for being lame...after we got back from KY I've been tired
Woof!! Friday morningish I think. I heard! Missed ya. Beach was great! How was ky??
It was really nice...just wish we had more time there. Michael had a big project at work
His family was very nice
Awesome!! Yeah it seemed like a quick trip. Fucking work, man
Lol
So true. And a 12 hour drive there and back
But the beach was fun??
That ocean swim looked awesome
Yeah that's a lot of travel! Beach was fantastic. R and I ran & did a polar plunge this morning! I really enjoy the frat people for like a day or two. No disrespect!
Lol
It was COLD! Couldn't breathe! But then you really feel the life force flowing through you, you know??
Lol
Michael was jealous
He wants to do it
Dude he can come next year!!
Lol
Obvi!
It looks like you guys had fun though
R and I did one in 2012 but not 2013, and 2012 was a much better year, so obvs we have to do it every year now
Oh yeah so great. I looooove it there. High of like 12 in pa on Friday
Lol
Oh man
What did y'all do, chill out??
Yeah, he worked until 6...so I brought wine and cheese and we just chilled. No clue why but I was so tired
Did you guys stay at the house or go to that martini bar??

So we went to jockey's ridge that afternoon, then to an obx brewery (I really liked it, we gotta go next time!), then dinner at the martini bar, then snacks and games and drinking at home. It was super fun!
Oh man
Sounds like a lot of fun
Yeah an action packed night. We all stayed up way after midnight all three nights somehow? Miracle of 2014?
Lol
I'm impressed
Glad you guys had so much fun
Lol
Definitely rested
Haha
Yeah!! I'm glad you chilled out! I hope your body is rested.
Lol!!!!
Good times
Speaking of which, I have to hit the hay. Working tomorrow
Night!
At one point my mom asked about you and was like "oh, resting her body?" and Richard was like "does everyone have to say that every time someone mentions Merf??" Ah a true classic.
Bonsoir!
